name: Restorative Justice Diversion
description: In partnership with District Attorneys in Alameda and San Francisco Counties, the Restorative Justice Diversion (RJD) program provides an alternative to incarceration for youth and young adults up to 25 years-old who have been arrested for high misdemeanors and felonies. Through RJD, we bring together everyone who was impacted by a crime in order to address the harm caused and come up with a reconciliation plan.
